divs: Sighting DetailsTonight (August 24th 2009) at 8:10pm my daughter told me there was a bright object in the sky. Thinking it was an early star I went outside to look. It was still very light out so I was suprised to see this very bright white object, so I told her it was probably Venus or another planet. just to be sure I had brought my binoculars for viewing. I watched this oject for about 15 minutes and it was motionless the whole time then I noticed a west bound commercial plane approaching close to the object so I kept on viewing the object and at one point I could see the object and the plane within the view of my binoculars. The plane appeared to be at cruising alttitude so I'm guessing 30-35,000 feet. The plane didn't react to the object so this further bolstered my belief it was a star or planet. At that moment the object became very fuzzy and dimmer. Thinking I had fogged up my binoculars I cleaned the optics and returned to viewing the object. At this point there was a whispy plume coming off of the now dimmer object and within the plume I could see smaller white orbs shooting through. I instantly thought this reminded me of a YouTube UFO video from Mexico where an object was shooting orbs out of it, I mean it looked almost exactly like that. I ran in to get my video camera and by the time I got back the event was over I swear to everyone who reads this that I actually saw this event as described.
Summary: As bright as Venus then dims while ejecting plume and smaller orbs
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Loveland-Madeira Corridor
There were no other sightings in Loveland-Madeira Corridor on or around August 24th 2009
